name: Intergalactic Battle Roosters
storyline:
The darkest day in intergalactic history is upon us. Don’s Taco Shop has been raided, and all the sweet, precious taco ingredients we hold dear have been taken from us.

As an Intergalactic Battle Rooster, you are a rock star, hotshot pilot; the crème de la crème of fighting forces, tasked with retrieving the taco ingredients for Don. Your skill, and reputation, knows no bounds.

Choose from an outlandish range of weapons and clever modifications to build your perfect starting tactics, then fight your way through bullet madness to uncover exciting combinations of new strategies and upgrades for your weapons and your pilots.

It’s time for these birds to take flight and fight.
summary: It’s time to cluck around and find out. Gear up and pull on the helmets of the Battle Roosters, a hotshot space brigade of poultry with panache. In this quirky, roguelike, bullet hell adventure you’ll combine weapons, upgrades and killer strategies to recover space’s best taco ingredients. Bwark!
